title: 'Amazing quality'
body: I had to gift and it's amazing

title: 'Not worth the money'
body: Within 1 month of usage the top layer started to peel off. Don't buy. It's the worst product. Not worthy for the price it is sold.

title: 'Product delivered was not a reversible belt
rating: but one with the same color inside out'
body: '1.0 out of 5 stars''Product delivered was not the same as shown here. Reversible belt it says with one side brown and the other black however the product received had only 1 color (brown) inside out.'

title: Please don't buy it.
body: Very bad quality of product. First layer cutting down itself. Please don't buy it.

title: 'Not sure whether this one is an original product'
body: 'I received the product in a bubble wrap the box was missing as shown in the images'

title: 'Quality issue
body: Incorrect Width Mentioned''1.0 out of 5 stars''Hi All  This product seems to have Quality issue Scratches on Buckle Incorrect Width Mentioned. This is not grain leather Size mentioned on Product site was for 1.5 Inches width whereas it is only 1.25 Inches. Product also seems to be a counterfeit and not original Tommy Hilfiger one.  Veerendra'

title: 'Value for money and very stylish'
body: 'Product is of very good quality compared to the earlier version of the same kind.'

title: 'it is worth less to buy. in 6-months the leather is peeling up...'
'Very low quality leather that it had started to tear'
body: 'They say that it is a Tommy Hilfiger product dont belive i bought this 2 months ago and now it had started to tore. The product quality is not at all acceptable.'

title: 'Very nice and quality product from TH on Amazon.'
body: 'Delivered after 5 days. Came packed in a nice TH box along with TH logo printed fabric bag (that can be used to keep other stuff too) . Wearing this same belt for last 2 years hence ordered again. Elegant look and very fine finish. The leather is matte finished (brown) and is adequatly soft. Size "S" is bit smaller to waist size - 35inch and hence needed some extra holes and modification to fit. (Would have ordered a bigger size). Overall length of leather - 41inch First hole at 32 inch Last hole at 37 inch With six holes @ 1 inch. Check the size carefully before ordering.'

title: 'Worst and defective product'
body: 'I am having worst experience on this item. Although TOMMY HILFIGER is a brand name but the quality of belt is worse. Within a month layer is coming out and looks like it not a branded item. I want this to be replaced or returned.'
